This cuddly colorful interactive character provides fun for all ages! Family and friends are sure to be entertained. Be careful what you say Wally is always listening!

Talking Wally loves to repeat everything you say in an entertaining silly voice. You have to see what happens when he opens his presents. When he’s hungry he’ll rub his belly that’s your cue to feed him a yummy lollipop. Wally also loves to play catch, and if you ask nicely he will entertain you by performing a special rain dance.

Wally will provide hours of cool fun!

CHECK IT OUT FOR FREE NOW
